name: Compilation C
overview: Atari Corp UK released this compilation cassette in 1987. This cassette contains re-releases of the Bug-Byte Software games Savage Pond, Up Up And Away, Cloak of Death, Leaper and Quest For Eternity. Savage Pond, Up Up and Away are machine code games, and load as normal. Cloak of Death, Leaper and Quest For Eternity require BASIC to be enabled on booting. To load the basic enabled games, remove any cartridges, power on the machine as normal, and type CLOAD and hit [RETURN]. When the game is finished loading, type RUN and hit [RETURN] to continue. On the Atari 400/800 the BASIC cartridge must be inserted. (Insert BASIC into the left cartridge slot in the Atari 800) Both Cloak of Death and Quest For Eternity support saving your position in the game. A blank cassette is required for this purpose. Side A: Savage Pond, Up Up and Away, Cloak of Death. Side B: Leaper, Quest For Eternity.
